taskDescription: Uses push-to-talk mode to control when ALFRED listens
Prefers health check-ins in her own home over hospital settings
Feels cautious but somewhat secure with health monitoring
Control when and how to interact with ALFRED
Maintain privacy and autonomy over therapy participation
Dismisses unsolicited notifications about social activities
Uses formal and concise speech when interacting with ALFRED
Feels uneasy about technology and prefers to keep her privacy intact
Responds curtly to medication reminders from ALFRED
Disables spontaneous voice prompts on ALFRED
Maintains control over communication and contact preferences
